cards.name: Scorn
cards.ability: When you discard this, put it back and give +2 Power to itself and one of your cards in play.

cards.name: Spider-Man Noir
cards.ability: On Reveal: If your other cards in play cost exactly 8 total, add the top card of your deck here. Set its Power to 8. (0/8)

cards.name: Superior Spider-Man
cards.ability: At the start of each turn, you get +1 Energy if you have any cards with increased Power in play.

cards.name: Chameleon
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the text of another card here you revealed this turn.

cards.name: Wade Wilson
cards.ability: When Destroyed: Replace this with a 1-Cost card from your hand or deck with +1 Power.

cards.name: Chamber
cards.ability: Activate: +2 Power for each 5-Cost or higher card you have here and in hand.

cards.name: Maverick
cards.ability: Activate: Give the next card you play Power equal to this card’s Power.

cards.name: Weapon H
cards.ability: When Discarded: Put this back with -2 Cost.

cards.name: Adamantium Infusion
cards.ability: On Reveal: Revive your highest-Power destroyed card here with its Power doubled.

cards.name: Weapon X Wolverine
cards.ability: After one of your other cards is destroyed, +1 Power. After every 3rd time, improve this effect by 1. (0/3)

cards.name: Wild Child
cards.ability: Ongoing: +4 Power if you’ve discarded a card. +4 Power if one of your cards has been destroyed.

cards.name: Fastball Special
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy your highest-Power card here to afflict an enemy card here with that much negative Power.

cards.name: Fantomex
cards.ability: Activate: If you've had cards discarded and destroyed, afflict front-row enemy cards at each location with -2 Power.

cards.name: Aurora
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give one of your other On Reveal cards at each location +2 Power. Repeat for Ongoing, Activate, and End of Turn.

cards.name: Marrow
cards.ability: When Discarded or Destroyed: Randomly split -6 Power among enemy cards.

cards.name: Shou Lao
cards.ability: Unknown

cards.name: Dragon Breath
cards.ability: Unknown

cards.name: Dragon Man
cards.ability: End of Turn: +2 Power for each location that's full on your side.

cards.name: Fin Fang Foom
cards.ability: On Reveal: Gain the Power of front-row enemy cards here.

cards.name: Brand of Shou-Lao
cards.ability: On Reveal: One of your other cards here steals 2 Power from the highest-Cost character in your opponent's hand.

cards.name: Rogue
cards.ability: On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Ongoing card here.

cards.name: Mobius M. Mobius
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your Costs can't be increased. Your opponent's Costs can't be reduced.

cards.name: Shadow King
cards.ability: On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

cards.name: Firelord
cards.ability: On Reveal: Revive one of your discarded or destroyed 3-Cost cards here.

cards.name: Invisible Woman: First Steps
cards.ability: Activate: This turn, your End of Turn abilities happen twice.

cards.name: Warlock
cards.ability: Activate: For each unspent Energy, give a card in your hand -1 Cost.

cards.name: Zombie Giant-Man
cards.ability: On Reveal: Horde +2, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.

cards.name: Zombie Scarlet Witch
cards.ability: After you play a card here, Horde +2.

locations.name: Ta Lo
locations.ability: End of Turn: +1 Power to a card in each player’s hand.

locations.name: Cave of The Dragon
locations.ability: After turn 4, add a random 5-Cost or higher card here for each player.

items.title: GGWCS Qualifier #3
items: Watch the Golden Gauntlet matches live on Twitch!

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: This event features exciting new rewards including the brand new Skill card, The Hunger to keep feeding your Horde. This run of Sanctum Showdown will also include a new 7 day Premium Event Pass for 800 Gold which includes an exclusive variant and a BUNCH of bonus value.

items.title: Grand Arena
items: Return to the Grand Arena, featuring NEW champions including Magneto, Thor, Hulk, and Ghost-Spider. Fight for Glory and claim the new Zombie Sentry card and new Champion Variants as event rewards! This mode will also have a new Premium Event Pass for 800 Gold which includes another exclusive variant and more bonus value to help on your journey.

items.title: Featured Sets
items: Oct 15 - Oct 21 - Sanctum Showdown Picks
Oct 22 - Nov 1 - Dark Fantasy Variant Spotlight

items.name: Zombie Scarlet Witch
changes: 3/2 – After you play a card here, Horde +2.

items.name: Zombie Giant-Man
changes: 5/3 – On Reveal: Horde +1, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.
5/4 – On Reveal: Horde +2, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.

items.name: Invisible Woman First Steps
changes: 3/5 – Activate: This turn, your End of Turn abilities happen twice.

items.name: Shadow King
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

items.name: Mobius M. Mobius
changes: 3/4 – Ongoing: Your Costs can’t be increased. Your opponent’s Costs can’t be reduced.

items.name: Rogue
changes: 3/2 – On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Ongoing card here.

items.name: Firelord
